item.title: Groupon Promo Codes: 50% Off in September 2025
item.description: Unlock up to 50% off with top Groupon coupon codes, and explore deals on getaways, spa packages, memberships, and event tickets in September 2025.

item.title: Meta Poaches OpenAI Scientist to Help Lead AI Lab
item.description: Yang Song, who previously led the strategic explorations team at OpenAI, is the new ‘research principal’ of Meta Superintelligence Labs.

item.title: 9 Best Robot Vacuums (2025): Tested and Reviewed in Real Homes
item.description: Whether you’re up against pet hair or you want to splurge on a high-end laser-guided robot vacuum, we have the perfect pick for you.

item.title: Qualcomm Debuts Snapdragon X2 Elite and X2 Elite Extreme, Its Next-Gen Laptop Chips
item.description: Qualcomm just announced the Snapdragon X2 Elite and X2 Elite Extreme, anticipated sequels to its game-changing PC chips.

item.title: Save $50 on Our Favorite Budget Graphics Card
